Name: RequestIntent
Title: RequestIntent
Descriptino: Codes indicating the degree of authority/intentionality associated with a request.

Name: RequestStatus
Title: RequestStatus
Descriptino: Codes identifying the lifecycle stage of a request.

Name: SNOMED_CT
Title: SNOMED CT (all versions)
Descriptino: SNOMED CT is the most comprehensive and precise clinical health terminology product in the world, owned and distributed around the world by The International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO).

Name: ActReason
Title: ActReason
Descriptino: A set of codes specifying the motivation, cause, or rationale of an Act, when such rationale is not reasonably represented as an ActRelationship of type "has reason" linking to another Act.    *Examples:* Example reasons that might qualify for being coded in this field might be: "routine requirement", "infectious disease reporting requirement", "on patient request", "required by law".

Name: BeTempRequestedService
Title: BeTempRequestedService
Descriptino: Temporary codes for indicating services that can be requested from a Nurse

Name: BeTempRequestedServiceDetail
Title: BeTempRequestedServiceDetail
Descriptino: Temporary codes for indicating service details that can be requested from a Nurse

Name: BePrescriptionStatusReason
Title: BePrescriptionStatusReason
Descriptino: Status reason for the prescription. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

Name: BeTreatmentStatusReason
Title: BeTreatmentStatusReason
Descriptino: Status reason for the treatment. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.
